dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HRES 40 EH: Electing Members to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: In the House of Representatives, U. S.,
form.official-title: Electing Members to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.

section.text: That the following named Members be, and are hereby, elected to the following standing committees of the House of Representatives:

committee-appointment-paragraph.text: Ms. Adams, Ms. Graham, and Mr. Ashford.
Mr. Yarmuth (to rank immediately after Mr. Van Hollen), Mr. Norcross, and Mr. Moulton.
Mrs. Torres, Mrs. Dingell, Mr. Takai, and Mr. Gallego.

committee-appointment-paragraph.header: Committee on Oversight and Government Reform:
committee-appointment-paragraph.text: Mr. Lieu of California, Mrs. Watson Coleman, Ms. Plaskett, Mr. DeSaulnier, and Mr. Brendan F. Boyle of Pennsylvania.

committee-appointment-paragraph.header: Committee on Science, Space, and Technology:
